form.pleaseAgree: To create your account, you need to agree with our terms of service and privacy policy
form.agreement: I agree with the terms of service and privacy policy
form.contactHeading: Contact information is only used for necessary contacts and not published
form.displayNameHint: This name will be displayed to others
form.mobilePhoneHint: Non United States phone numbers must be a international number format beginning with +

confirmation.headingWithMobilePhone: Nice to meet you, {{name}}! We'll send a verification code to get the next step to the mobile number below. Is there no problem with that?
confirmation.headingWithEmail: Nice to meet you, {{name}}! We'll send a link to get the next step to the address below. Is there no problem with that?

codeVerification.heading: Please enter the verification code
codeVerification.guidance: We sent a verification code of 6 digits to {{phoneNumber}}.
codeVerification.notReceiving: In case you do not receive the message
codeVerification.resendSuccess: New verification code has been sent.

emailMessage.heading: Please check your mailbox!
emailMessage.mainGuidance: We sent a message with a link to setup your account to {{email}}
emailMessage.notReceiving: In case you do not receive the email
emailMessage.notReceivingGuidance: Please check the spam mail folder and the address you entered. If you still can not find it, you can try again from the beginning.

sessionContinue.heading: Your AmID has been created!
sessionContinue.question: Would you like to stay signed in?
sessionContinue.hint: Not recommended if this device is shared with someone.
sessionContinue.no: Sign out on closing the browser

emailVerified.heading: Final check
emailVerified.guidance: Are you sure you want to register {{email}} as {{displayName}}'s primary email address?

confirmation.current: Are you sure to sign out of currently using accountï¼ˆ{{displayName}}?
confirmation.all: This browser has {{count}} signed-in accounts. Are you sure to sign out of all of them?
confirmation.specific: Are you sure to remove the account of {{displayName}} from this session?

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Your public information, such as your display name and profile image can be edit here and you can change the scope of sharing the information.

settings.title: Account Settings
settings.description: General non-public settings that allows you to use AmID according to your environment, such as your location and display language.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: You can edit your contact information, such as your email address and mobile number, that will be used for service contact and sign-in authentication.

authAndSecurity.title: Authentication and Security
authAndSecurity.description: You can set the authentication factor and flow when signing in to AmID. You can also see which devices have access to your account.

home.guidance: The Account Dashboard allows you to centrally manage your account-related settings.

profile.title: Profile

help.displayName: This name will be your identity. It doesn't need to be your real name.
help.profilePicture: Profile picture will be shown in many places of the services. Please do not set inappropriate pictures.

profile.historyDescription: Once a history item is deleted, it cannot be restored. The latest history will be the current {{field}}.

profilePicture.guidance: You can upload up to 10 images and switch from them.

uploader.selectPicture: Tap here to select a file on your device or just drop it.
uploader.help: Only image files (less than 5MB) are allowed to upload.
uploader.selectIconGuidance: Please select your new profile picture
uploader.cropGuidance: Let's crop your profile picture into squares

language.title: Display Language
language.helpText: If available, we will provide services in your preferred language.

timezone.title: Timezone
timezone.helpText: Internal system uses the Coordinated Universal Time, but it converts and displays in the desired time zone.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: Your contact information will only be used to identify you for sign-in or send you necessary messages related to our services. It will never be used other than that without your permission.

errors.tokenExpired: The sign-in process is taking too long. Please start over for security reasons.

tokenExpireAlert.oneMinuteWarning: For security reasons, you will have to restart the sign-in process in one minute. Please hurry to the next step.

enterCodeEmail.guidanceBeforeSend: To verify your identity, we'll send a verification code to your registered primary email address.
enterCodeEmail.heading: Enter verification code
enterCodeEmail.guidance: We have sent a verification code to sign in to your registered email address.
enterCodeEmail.emailSent: A verification code has been sent. It is valid for 5 minutes.

enterCodePhone.guidanceBeforeSend: To verify your identity, we'll send a verification code to your registered mobile phone number.
enterCodePhone.guidance: We have sent a verification code to sign in to your registered email address.

sessionContinue.heading: All authentications completed!
sessionContinue.question: Would you like to stay signed in?
sessionContinue.hint: This setting will reduce the number of sign-ins, but NOT recommended if this device is shared with someone.
sessionContinue.no: Sign out on closing the browser
